topic.title: Where is the windows zeronet open source?

1509721890_17Nme2gWN8QqD2APgvXV9vn6jR8Vr.body: 我就知道，在打开代理的时候，不行。

> [akito](#comment_353_1F8omDpXyPsBfd9CBJ91o4Wv1AA2KxqMEY): Except your ISP does not allow you to port forward... Which ISP do you use?

是啊，没有公网ip，在一个局域网里的ip，可能是打不开的。

1509723698_18kZo3th7NiH2wQ2dP1rFXXpUhfnP.body:
> [gitcenter](#comment_13_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet

Thanks, but this is not for windows source. It's ".py", not ".exe".

> [nofish](#comment_1049_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Python is a multi-platform language, it means the source code is the same in all platform.You can generate .exe from .py using this command: https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroBundle/blob/master/compile/compile_win.cmd

Very nice. Thank you.

1_1F8VgytUggkP8kkieK8GcEMVsJTwcoAqdk.body: 大家猜猜楼主的ip是多少，猜对的说明zeronet可以查到ip，用事实说话。

1510252302_1Mb5HMCBsLTFkCZdkaiLcp38c3XwE.body: Zerohello has a search bar for public

1510618291_1CyTL2ry28YCGU9LCBPhXC1ZnKcoz.body:
根目录下找到zeronet.conf文件，没有就新建一个，
修改
`tor = always`
`tor_controller = 127.0.0.1:9151`
`tor_proxy = 127.0.0.1:9150`
保存
* 先打开Tor
* 再打开Zeronet
